name: Blitz Magic Jewel 2
description:
Blitz Magic Jewel 2 is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful gem crunching effects and well designed puzzles for you to play in subway time!
How to play:
1: Match 3 or more identical jewels.
2: Match the jewels until the board transparency,the mystery jewels will appear.
3: Make the mystery jewels down to last line to pass the level.
4：Collect jewels, and the mysterious treasures to complete the task
